author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
I have been following the travels of “itchyboots” on YouTube, she is a Dutch lady riding her motorcycle from north to south down the byways of west Africa. I was amazed at how far behind us the region of central west Africa is with one country only having mains electricity supplied by a single generating ship supplied by Turkey leaving most of the country reliant on solar and generators giving them power for only a couple of hours each day.
The rivers are their main highways and they are very complacent about safety issues
